Description:
Model
Brand: Corsair
Series: MP600 CORE XT
Model: CSSD-F1000GBMP600CXTR2
Device Type: Internal Solid State Drive (SSD)
Used For: Consumer


Details
Form Factor: M.2 2280
Capacity: 1TB
Memory Components: 3D QLC
Interface: PCI-Express 4.0 x4
Protocol: NVMe 1.4
Controller: Phison PS2027-E27T
Encryption: AES 256-bit encryption


Performance
Max Sequential Read: Up to 5900 MBps
Max Sequential Write: Up to 5000 MBps
4KB Random Read: Up to 500,000 IOPS
4KB Random Write: Up to 1,000,000 IOPS
MTBF: 1,600,000 hours
HeatSink: without HeatSink


Features
Features: * Impressive Gen4 Storage Performance: A PCIe Gen4 x4 controller delivers up to 5,900MB/sec sequential 
read and 5,000MB/sec sequential write speeds*, for outstanding read, write, and response times
* Your PC Made Faster: Load games, boot Windows, open and transfer files, all faster than ever.
* High-Speed Gen4 PCIe x4 NVMe 1.4 M.2 Interface: Using PCIe Gen4 technology for maximum bandwidth, 
the MP600 CORE XT delivers great storage performance
* High-Density 3D QLC NAND: Provides the ideal combination of performance and value
* Compact M.2 2280 Form-Factor Great for Notebooks: Fits directly onto most motherboards, making a 
great upgrade for laptops and notebooks with PCIe Gen4-capable CPUs
* Backward Compatible**: Support for PCIe Gen3 systems
* CORSAIR SSD Toolbox Software: Enables advanced drive controls from your desktop including secure erase 
and firmware updates
* Comprehensive Five-Year Warranty: Long-term reliability and industry-leading customer support for peace 
of mind


Environmental
Power Consumption (Idle): < 50mW
Power Consumption (Active): Active Read 5.5W
Active Write: 3.7W
Label: SSD M.2 Corsair MP600 CORE XT R2 1TB
